file_content.text: Was hunt of great honor to Scorekeeper?
Returned with trophy I might envy?
[Limit: 1][SD-0 Defeated] I destroyed an ancient droid in old Coruscant.
Was creation of Gree? Unpredictable and dangerous.
[Limit: 1][The First Defeated] I slew the broodmother yozusk on Dromund Kaas.
Fortunate to have succeeded. To watch yozusk feed on prey is to know nature's cruelty.
[Limit: 1][Subject Alpha Defeated] I killed a mutated monster on Taris.
A mercy. Is twisted place that begs for death.
[Limit: 1][Grandfather Defeated] I slew the oldest bormu on Balmorra.
Bormu rarely hostile. When enraged, ground itself shakes with fear.
[Limit: 1][Trapjaw Defeated] I claimed the most ferocious wraid on Tatooine.
Wraid hunting is long-honored tradition. Scorekeeper is surely pleased.
[Limit: 1][Battledroid R4-GL Defeated] I destroyed a giant battledroid on Nar Shaddaa.
Unnatural hunts do not appeal to me. Is proof of prowess, good practice for hunts of flesh and blood.
[Limit: 1][Ulgo Siegebreaker Defeated] I destroyed House Ulgo's greatest war machine on Alderaan.
Is dangerous ground, a battlefield. Is rarely place for patience and cunning; quick of mind, quick of body prevail.
[Limit: 1][Rogue Cartel Warbot Defeated] I smashed a Hutt Cartel war bot on Quesh.
Hutts think they are masters of all. Is pleasing to prove otherwise.
[Limit: 1][The Ancient One Defeated] I slew a gigantic k'lor'slug on Taris.
Adaptable creatures. Hungry, vicious. Hard to kill, harder to kill off.
[Limit: 1][Snowblind Defeated] I skinned the largest snow cat on Hoth.
Glorious pelt! Any of Scorekeeper's faithful can see it came from majestic creature.
[Limit: 1][Gargath Defeated] I slew the massive Kintan strider on Hoth.
Is truth? Was great skill among hunting party to accomplish.
[Limit: 1][The Primal Destroyer Defeated] I killed a millennia-old monster on Belsavis.
Defiled place, Belsavis. Was meddled by Rakata, now place of grim cages. I do not like it.
[Limit: 1][The Nightmare Pilgrim Defeated] I defeated the most fearsome foe in the Nightmare Lands of Voss.
Is planet with will of its own. To strike down nature itself, impressive.
[Limit: 1][Dreadtooth Defeated] I slew a rampaging Drouk on Belsavis.
Warstalkers used such creatures in battle, armies scattered at their howl.
[Limit: 1][Lucky Defeated] I took this claw from the largest Rancor on Corellia.
Is Rancor not a marvelous beast? My claw is precious too.
What other stories have hunter to tell?
[Requires Influence Level 10] This has been cathartic, in a way. I know we will survive Arcann, as we have survived this.
Scorekeeper has tested us. Made stronger having known defeat, I think.
There are lessons to be learned from everything, failure most of all.
Second life is rare gift. Scorekeeper expects great things for it.
Not a very Trandoshan sentiment, Qyzen.
Is lesson of long life, also not common.
My strength is tempered and I am ready to unleash it.
Is time ones who wrong you see justice.
I follow you, Herald, until Scorekeeper raises us to her paradise.
[Requires Influence Level 10] You've seen how your Scorekeeper smiles on me. Are you willing to join me now?
Scorekeeper favors you indeed. No coincidence she crossed our paths.
Warstalkers will join your hunt, your prey is our prey.
Bring your troops to Odessen and you'll have no shortage of game.
Thank you, Great Stalker.
Qyzen. You may call me Qyzen.
After proving my worth, I expect you to do the same.
Scorekeeper shall witness much from us both.
We quit this place soon. I will find you.
Nothing new to report.
Those who hunt, feast.
I have not.
Is not the time to show soft belly, hunt.
Return for aid in cleansing?
Yes, I want the Scorekeeper's forgiveness.
[Refuse Offer] For the last time, I'm fine.
I can see you are not. When you see, come to me.
[Bypass Mission] I came to the realization that I am not the only one affected. The whole galaxy is Arcann's prisoner. Freeing ourselves is the answer.
Is conversation not concluded?
What must I bring you to convince you to join me?
[Refuse Offer] I guess we don't have anything more to discuss.
Scorekeeper watch your victories.
Great Stalker, soft thing approach. Shall offer its heart if you desire.
Is no wish of mine, Brek.
Is shameful to strike fellow hunter, more so to strike Herald of Scorekeeper.
Scorekeeper has not welcomed her Herald home just yet. Is pleasing to find.
Greetings, my friend. You've taken well to leadership.
Qyzen? You lead the Warstalkers now?
Is Great Stalker. Scorekeeper's favored son!
Please don't go spreading your Herald beliefs to the rest of your troops.
Many know of you, Herald. Slayer of Kephess, friend to Great Stalker. Brek remembers our first meeting vividly.
True path of Scorekeeper is tread, due to you. Great Stalker's followers are many.
I do not lead, they follow. Was Veneb's defeat when this started. Clan spans far and wide, yet always underfoot. Hard to hunt so.
Was hunt of Sith Emperor, I last scented you. Believed Scorekeeper call you back to her side, for such tribute.
We didn't succeed, Qyzen. I was captured and imprisoned.
I haven't earned that honor just yet.
Scorekeeper provides.
Were you lost without your Herald?
Is familiar path I walk to Scorekeeper. If more is sought, Herald is sure to guide.
I must hear of hunt and honor your score, Herald.
I don't think the Scorekeeper favored me as much as you believe. I was captured.
Would you follow a Herald with no score?
I... misunderstand. Herald speaks truth, my ears not deceived?
I was robbed of my Jagannath, had my glories stolen by treachery.
Is truth?
Is thing of great sadness. Anger courses as poison through me. Who, Herald? Who affronts Scorekeeper so?
Calm yourself. I have suffered, yes, but I am not dead. Just as you were not when I found you.
Is as you say. Perhaps Scorekeeper wishes I return favor owed.
It was Arcann, the new Emperor of the Eternal Empire.
I have new quarry.
The Eternal Empire is to blame. Help me make them pay for what they've done.
Is thing that must be punished!
We must cleanse disgrace, as I had. Honor hunt, honor Scorekeeper, cleanse soul.
We must hunt, Herald. Seek forgiveness in way fitting for you. Greatest of beasts will wash away disgrace.
I don't feel any shame over my capture.
Is slow venom. Even if Herald endures, weakness will cast doubt. Scorekeeper's faithful need your strength.
I understand. We'll purge my shame.
I know quarries of great challenge, perfect prey. We cannot hunt alone, gather others seeking such Jagannath.
When offered to Scorekeeper, you too will feel lightness.
[Refuse Offer] I'm sorry, this is no time for me to be hunting.
I will be here to guide, when you understand your loss.
[Bypass Mission] I was just the first to be wronged. Is the galaxy not held prisoner by Arcann? It's not a tribute the Scorekeeper needs, it's freedom.
Herald's words always find their mark. I have been thoughtless too long. We hunt this threat, break the cage around us all.
Bring your Warstalkers to Odessen. We need you.
Thank you, old friend.
Now you're finally seeing the truth.
Brek, gather clan!
Yes, Great Stalker!
Is shameful to strike fellow hunter.
More so to strike friend. Mako, is good to see you grown into tougher skin.
You two know each other?
Wasn't aware Trandos could make friends.
Hey, be nice. Qyzen's one of the better people I've met in this business.
He was part of Braden's crew for a little while. Hunting down criminals wasn't his kind of sport, right?
Is true. To beasts the hunt is life, they are not distracted by artificial things.
Unless hunter does not share Scorekeeper's respect.
A warrior always has my respect.
I prefer hunt to battle. Scorekeeper honors, none the less.
You a bounty hunter too?
Have hunted such game in past, natural prey brings greater satisfaction.
The last Trando I met here only cared whether someone was worth killing.
Some think Scorekeeper values Jagannath alone, are more beast than hunter.
Beasts are hunted, when captured: made nothing. Reneget Vause soared high and fell far.
Much Jagannath would Reneget Vause have now, was hunter not attracted to his scent.
What is hunter's quarry now?
I'm looking for the new leader of the Warstalkers. That you?
Attempt to hunt Great Stalker, you find only regret.
Heard a lot of Trandoshan mercenaries were here. I'm offering work.
To lash at whatever is found is not to hunt.
Forgive Brek. Young are overeager to prove worth, is same for your species. Yes?
Are you one of the Warstalkers?
Great Stalker is leader of Warstalkers. He is legend. Challenge him at your own peril.
I am prey to their curiosity, no more.
More often then not.
Not many Trandoshans see my years. Wartimes offer much, yet take more.
That's where any similarities end.
Soft thing has insulting tongue.
Is truth to words.
What brings soft thing to me?
I'm searching for the leader of the Warstalkers.
I do not lead, they follow.
I'm hiring mercenaries.
Is of more interest to Brek. Show offer to him.
Where Great Stalker goes, Warstalkers follow. Scorekeeper's eyes watch him closely.
I am recruiting allies to fight the Eternal Empire. I know the Warstalkers are worth their price.
I'm sure the Scorekeeper would see my offer as more than worthy. The greatest enemy this galaxy has known.
Soft thing wishes to fight Zakuul?
I would not choose such path, but... if Scorekeeper sees your hunt is worthy, I will join it.
Bring me proof that Scorekeeper favors you.
Very well. What would convince you?
You doubt my score?
We follow different paths. To abandon mine, to follow yours, requires convincing.
Hunt that which Scorekeeper values most. When I am satisfied the Scorekeeper has sent another Herald, that path I follow.
[Refuse Offer] I don't need your goddess's approval.
I do.
Great Stalker has spoken, go.
Is not time to speak. Is prey here and words are poor lure.
[Scorekeeper Trophy] I have slain one of the beasts on Hoth worthy of Jagannath.
I'm still on the hunt.
[5 Scorekeeper Trophies] I have slain many beasts on Hoth worthy of Jagannath.
